ace_db_host_add()

ace_db_host_add(string  $host_name, string  $host_domain, string  $host_description, string  $host_hypervisor, string  $host_ip_internal, string  $host_ip_external, string  $host_username, string  $host_password, integer  $host_threads, integer  $host_memory, integer  $host_storage) : integer|boolean

add a new host

Parameters

string $host_name

host name
string $host_domain

host domain name
string $host_description

description of host
string $host_hypervisor

hypervisor running on host
string $host_ip_internal

host's internal IP address accessible by web server
string $host_ip_external

host's external IP address (for information only)
string $host_username

user name used by ACEITLab to access the hypervisor on the host
string $host_password

password used by ACEITLab to access the hypervisor on the host
integer $host_threads

maximum number of threads supported by the host
integer $host_memory

maximum amount (GiB) of usable RAM on the host
integer $host_storage

maximum amount (GiB) of usable storage on the host

Returns

integer|boolean —

last insert id | FALSE on error

File

ace_db_host_update()

ace_db_host_update(integer  $host_id, string  $host_name, string  $host_domain, string  $host_description, string  $host_hypervisor, string  $host_ip_internal, string  $host_ip_external, string  $host_username, string  $host_password, integer  $host_threads, integer  $host_memory, integer  $host_storage) : boolean

update a host record

Parameters

integer $host_id

host id
string $host_name

host name
string $host_domain

host domain name
string $host_description

description of host
string $host_hypervisor

hypervisor running on host
string $host_ip_internal

host's internal IP address accessible by web server
string $host_ip_external

host's external IP address (for information only)
string $host_username

user name used by ACEITLab to access the hypervisor on the host
string $host_password

password used by ACEITLab to access the hypervisor on the host
integer $host_threads

maximum number of threads supported by the host
integer $host_memory

maximum amount (GiB) of usable RAM on the host
integer $host_storage

maximum amount (GiB) of usable storage on the host

Returns

boolean —

on success

ace_virt()

ace_virt() : mixed

Hypervisor Abstractor

abstracts virt function calls so they are executed using the relevant library for the host

Returns

mixed

File

Tags

package

Default
global

resource $host_conn a libvirt host connection resource

array $host_info an array of host information

param string $command virt command param mixed $params command-associated parameters
